data.text: Fabulous hotel with extremely well appointed apartments with fully functional kitchen. Small onsite restaurant offers a comprehensive breakfast with a varied buffet. Eggs are cooked to order by competent chefs. Lunch and evening meals are available on demand. The one bedroom apartment was massive with high quality fittings and presented in excellent condition. The daily housekeeping was exceptional. There is a rooftop swimming pool with lifeguard in attendance. Being in a low rise area the pool has sun all day. All staff members were exceptional with a can do attitude. Easy access from the airport with many low cost dining options within walking distance. The main bus stop is opposite the hotel with a 5min ride to the metro station. Taxis are freely available as the Eagle Restaurant adjacent to the hotel is the main dining venue for drivers 24/7. Excellent value hotel.
data.title: Where apartment meets hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response

your feedback is highly appreciated and shared with our team members who look forward to welcoming you back again for another a memorable experience wishing you a happy stay always in Dubai.

Best regards,
Sitara Hotel Apartment Management

data.text: My sister and her family used to stay here most of the time and now I understand why. It’s not only because of the clean and modern facilities and rooms but most importantly, the service they are giving. From reception to amazing different varieties of breakfast they have. Please look for Arun and Chef Susatha, they will give you one of the best experience! Thanks to them our stay became so memorable.
data.title: ONE OF A KIND SERVICE ⭐️

data.text: I stayed solo for a while and then was joined by my family -- it was a fabulous experience for me. I enjoyed every bit in Sitara and always felt at home. Each and every member of their staff treats you with utmost respect and care!
data.title: One of my best ever stays.....

data.text: A very comfortable hotel with attentive staff and good accommodation.   We included breakfast in the price and this was very acceptable although since Ramadan started the breakfast system was changed, we preferred the buffet breakfast.  I would recommend this hotel to businessman or tourist. We used the bus and the metro a lot and found it very convenient. Would stay here again..  No complaints.
data.title: Sitara Hotel, pleasant experience.
